originalTranscription: I find myself in a library where books are alive and whisper their stories to each other. The shelves are endless corridors that shift and rearrange themselves. When I open a book, the story pulls me inside - I become the characters, living their lives in parallel. But the library is burning, pages curling and characters screaming as their worlds collapse. I try to save them but each rescue creates another fire somewhere else.
summary: A living library where books contain entire worlds that the dreamer can enter, but a mysterious fire threatens to destroy all the nested realities. Saving one world creates destruction elsewhere.

scenes.text: The infinite library with living books that whisper to each other, their shelves constantly rearranging into new corridors and chambers.
Entering a book's world and becoming its characters, while the library begins to burn with a fire that consumes nested realities.

fragments: The sound of books whispering their stories to each other.
The vertigo of becoming multiple characters simultaneously.
